Module Index


cache

cache_app
Application module for simple cache implementation from book Erlang and OTP in Action.

cache_element
Element, that store values in cache application from book Erlang and OTP in Action.

cache_element_sup
Supervisor module for cache elements from book Erlang and OTP in Action.

cache_event
Event manager for simple cache module from Erlang and OTP in Action.

cache_event_logger
Redirecting events to error_logger from Erlang and OTP in Action.

cache_store
Store module, which stores Key -> Pid pairs from book Erlang and OTP in Action.

cache_sup
Root supervisor module for simple cache application from book Erlang and OTP in Action.

simple_cache
API module for control simple cache system from Erlang and OTP in Action.
